articles.description: Two people were killed and several members of the UCC softball team injured in a head-on crash on OR 42 in Coos County. A van carrying 10 players was struck by a pickup that crossed the centerline. Impaired driving is suspected. The crash is under investigation.

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: An Oregon man was arrested after a six-week-old baby was hospitalized with serious injuries. Doctors found signs of ongoing abuse. Gage Dubuc, 24, of Myrtle Creek, faces felony child abuse charges and is being extradited to Shasta County.
articles.title: Oregon man arrested after baby hospitalized with broken bones, brain bleeds
